name: Fclone-Bot
description: Fclone is just another Tool like Autorclone/Folderclone/Gclone to bypass 750GB limit by google (more optimised for speed)

telegram_token.description: The Telegram Bot Token That You Get From @BotFather

user_ids.description: Your Telegram ID (multiple separated by commas, first ID is admin)

group_ids.description: Your Telegram Group ID (If you are not adding the bot to any group - you can leave it blank)
